ISSUE.TITLE: SendinBlue plugin. Use number type for some transactional attributes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 > From what I can find, when Category.Enum.Transactional is created for ORDER_PRICE > It's datatype is set to "Text" > In the newest version of Sendinblue, text is no longer allowed for SUM[ORDER_PRICE] > The Attribute type needs to be "Number" in their list (Or from what I can gather, float from the TypeEnum) > After changing the ORDER_PRICE to Number, the errors went away. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/95882/sendinblue-plugin#302825

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6527 Used number type for some transactional attributes
